message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $1,500,000.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only offer $900,000 at this time.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go as low as $900,000. How about $1,300,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $1,300,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $1,100,000.  If this doesn't work, I'll have to explore other options.
